description.french: Échouer en tant que mentor.
description.italian: Hai fallito come mentore
description.japanese: メンターとして失敗した
description.spanish: Has fracasado como mentor.

description.french: Réussir en tant que mentor.
description.italian: Hai avuto successo come mentore
description.japanese: メンターとして成功した
description.spanish: Has triunfado como mentor.

displayName.koreana: 브레이크 없이 끝까지 가는 거야, 베이비.
displayName.spanish: «A toda mecha y sin frenos, nena».

description.french: Protéger Los Angeles.
description.italian: Hai protetto Los Angeles
description.japanese: ロサンゼルスを守った
description.spanish: Has protegido Los Ángeles.

displayName.brazilian: Posso confirmar que ele é fodão.
displayName.english: "I can confirm he’s a bad ass."
displayName.german: „Ich kann bestätigen, dass er knallhart ist.“
displayName.italian: Posso confermare che è un duro.
displayName.japanese: 「カッコいい野郎なのは確かだ」
displayName.schinese: “我只知道他是个牛逼的狠角色。”
displayName.spanish: «Puedo decir que es el puto amo».

description.french: Choisir la voie de la clémence.
description.italian: Hai scelto la Via della misericordia
description.japanese: 赦しの道を選んだ
description.spanish: Has elegido el camino de la compasión.

description.french: Choisir la voie de la vengeance.
description.italian: Hai scelto la Via della vendetta
description.japanese: 復讐の道を選んだ
description.spanish: Has elegido el camino de la venganza.

description.french: Embrasser sur un brancard.
description.italian: Bacio sulla barella
description.japanese: 担架の上でキスした
description.spanish: Te has besado en una camilla.

displayName.brazilian: Tem planos pra hoje à noite?
displayName.french: « Un truc de prévu ce soir ? »

description.french: Embrasser sur une voiture.
description.italian: Bacio sull'auto
description.japanese: 車の上でキスした
description.spanish: Te has besado en un coche.

description.english: Kept Romance Out of the Workplace
description.french: Ne pas mêler romance et travail.
description.italian: Hai tenuto separati amore e lavoro
description.japanese: 職場に恋愛を持ち込まなかった
description.spanish: No has mezclado el amor con el trabajo.

displayName.brazilian: Cara, ele é, tipo, um herói de verdade.
displayName.japanese: 「それって、本物のヒーローじゃん」

description.french: Dire la vérité.
description.italian: Hai detto la verità
description.japanese: 真実を話した
description.spanish: Has contado la verdad.

displayName.brazilian: Eu sou só o cara atrás da mesa.
displayName.french: « Je suis le gars derrière son écran. »
displayName.german: „Ich bin der Typ hinter dem Schreibtisch.“
displayName.italian: Io sono quello dietro alla scrivania.
displayName.schinese: “我就是坐在办公桌后面的那个人。”

description.french: Cacher la vérité.
description.italian: Hai nascosto la verità
description.japanese: 真実を隠した
description.spanish: Has ocultado la verdad.

displayName.italian: C'è puzza di prodotti chimici qui dentro.
displayName.japanese: 「ここは化学物質の臭いがすごいな」
displayName.koreana: 여기 화학약품 냄새가 엄청 심하게 나네.
displayName.schinese: “这地方闻起来就全是清洁剂啊。”

description.brazilian: Deu a primeira chance da vida dele
description.french: Lui donner sa première chance.
description.italian: Gli hai concesso la sua prima chance
description.japanese: 初めて握る銃で撃った
description.spanish: Le has dado su primera oportunidad.

displayName.brazilian: Gostaria de fazer amor com você de novo.
displayName.english: "I wish to make love to you again."
displayName.german: „Ich würde gerne wieder mit dir Liebe machen.“
displayName.italian: Voglio fare di nuovo l'amore con te.
displayName.russian: «Я хочу снова предаться с тобой любви».
displayName.spanish: «Espero volver a hacerte el amor un día de estos».

description.brazilian: Deu uma segunda chance a ele
description.french: Lui donner une seconde chance.
description.italian: Gli hai concesso la sua seconda chance
description.japanese: やり直すチャンスを与えた
description.spanish: Le has dado una segunda oportunidad.

description.french: Récupérer une cravate.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto una cravatta
description.japanese: ネクタイを回収した
description.spanish: Has obtenido una corbata.

displayName.japanese: 「インビジガールを応援したじゃない...」
displayName.schinese: “但是我都为隐身女庆贺了啊……”

description.french: Récupérer un couteau.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto un coltello
description.japanese: ナイフを回収した
description.spanish: Has obtenido un cuchillo.

description.french: Réussir haut la main son évaluation.
description.italian: Hai superato brillantemente la valutazione delle tue prestazioni
description.japanese: 業績評価で高得点を取った
description.spanish: Has clavado tu evaluación de rendimiento.

description.french: Réussir tous les niveaux de piratage.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti gli hackeraggi
description.japanese: 全ハッキングレベルを成功させた
description.schinese: 成功通过所有黑客关卡
description.spanish: Has superado todos los niveles de hackeo.

description.brazilian: Alcançou a sinergia máxima com uma dupla de heróis
description.english: Reached Max Synergy With a Hero Duo
description.french: Atteindre la synergie max avec un duo de héros.
description.german: Max. Synergie mit einem Heldenduo erreicht
description.italian: Hai raggiunto la sinergia massima tra una coppia di eroi
description.japanese: 1組のヒーローコンビで最大相乗効果に到達した
description.schinese: 一对英雄组合达到了协同上限
description.spanish: Has alcanzado la sinergia máxima con un dúo de héroes.
description.tchinese: 有英雄搭檔達到最強協同效果

displayName.japanese: アンチウイルスクラブ

description.brazilian: Destruiu 3 antivírus em menos de 15 segundos
description.english: Destroyed 3 Antiviruses in Less Than 15 Seconds
description.french: Détruire 3 antivirus en moins de 15 secondes.
description.german: 3 Antivirenprogramme in weniger als 15 Sekunden zerstört
description.italian: Hai distrutto 3 antivirus in meno di 15 secondi
description.japanese: 15秒未満で3体のアンチウイルスを破壊した
description.russian: 3 антивируса уничтожены менее чем за 15 секунд.
description.schinese: 在15秒内干掉3个杀毒程序
description.spanish: Has destruido 3 antivirus en menos de 15 segundos.

description.brazilian: Aumentou o poder de 4 heróis diferentes
description.french: Améliorer les pouvoirs de 4 héros différents.
description.italian: Hai ampliato i poteri di 4 eroi diversi
description.japanese: 4人の異なるヒーローのパワーを強化した
description.schinese: 为4个不同的英雄扩展能力
description.spanish: Has ampliado los poderes de 4 héroes diferentes.

displayName.brazilian: Adoro botar na boca, na bunda...
displayName.english: "Love ‘em from my mouth to my butt."
displayName.french: « Dans ma bouche et dans mon... »
displayName.italian: Li adoro dalla bocca al sedere.
displayName.russian: «Сую его в рот по самые гланды».
displayName.schinese: “就喜欢从嘴巴直戳屁眼的感觉。”
displayName.spanish: «Me encanta meterme dónuts calentitos y enormes».

description.french: Choisir le donut le moins populaire.
description.italian: Hai scelto il donut meno popolare
description.japanese: 一番不人気のドーナツを選んだ
description.schinese: 选择了最冷门的甜甜圈
description.spanish: Has elegido el dónut menos popular.
description.tchinese: 選最不受歡迎的甜甜圈

description.brazilian: Escolheu o produto menos popular da loja
description.english: Chose the Least Popular Item from the Store
description.french: Choisir l'article le moins populaire de l'épicerie.
description.german: Den unbeliebtesten Artikel aus dem Laden gewählt
description.italian: Hai scelto l'oggetto meno popolare del negozio
description.japanese: 店で一番不人気の商品を選んだ
description.koreana: 상점에서 가장 인기 없는 물품을 선택했습니다
description.russian: Выбран самый непопулярный предмет в магазине.
description.schinese: 选择了商店里最冷门的道具
description.spanish: Has elegido el artículo menos popular de la tienda.
description.tchinese: 選店裡最不受歡迎的物品

description.french: Se faire embaucher au SDH.
description.italian: Sei stato assunto nell'SDN
description.japanese: SDNに雇用された
description.schinese: 加入超级英雄派遣中心
description.spanish: Has contratado en la RES.

displayName.japanese: 「そのトゥインキー、食うのか？」

description.french: Être désobéi par Invisimeuf.
description.italian: Invisigal ti ha disobbedito
description.japanese: インビジガールに反抗された
description.spanish: Invisiva te ha desobedecido.

description.brazilian: Concluiu um turno da Equipe-Z sem perder ou falhar um chamado
description.english: Completed a Z-Team Shift Without Missing or Failing a Call
description.french: Finir une période de travail sans échouer ou rater de mission.
description.german: Eine Z-Team-Schicht ohne verpasste oder fehlgeschlagene Anrufe abgeschlossen
description.italian: Hai completato un turno dello Z-Team avendo successo in tutte le chiamate e senza ignorarne nessuna
description.japanese: 通報を一度も無視および失敗せずにZチームのシフトを完了させた
description.koreana: 신고를 놓치거나 실패하지 않고 Z팀 근무를 마쳤습니다
description.russian: Все звонки на смене приняты и успешно завершены Я-командой.
description.schinese: 完成吊车尾队轮班，没有错过或搞砸任何呼叫
description.spanish: Has completado un turno del Equipo Z sin fallar ni perderte ninguna llamada.
description.tchinese: 完成Z小隊勤務，且沒有錯過呼叫事件或呼叫事件失敗

description.brazilian: Descobriu o poder inicial de todos os heróis
description.french: Découvrir le pouvoir de départ de chaque héros.
description.italian: Hai scoperto il potere iniziale di ogni eroe

description.schinese: 发现每个英雄的初始能力
description.spanish: Has descubierto el poder inicial de cada héroe.
description.tchinese: 發現每一位英雄的起始能力

displayName.spanish: El que no arriesga, no gana

description.brazilian: Teve sucesso num chamado com <15% de chance de sucesso
description.english: Succeeded a Call with <15% of Success
description.french: Réussir une mission avec <15 % de réussite.
description.italian: Hai completato una chiamata con <15% di probabilità di successo

description.russian: Дело удачно завершено с вероятностью успеха <15%.
description.schinese: 以不到15%的成功率完成一次呼叫
description.spanish: Has superado una llamada con una probabilidad de éxito de menos del 15 %.
description.tchinese: 呼叫事件成功，且成功率<15%

description.english: Failed a Call with >70% of Success

description.tchinese: 呼叫事件失敗，但成功率>70%

description.brazilian: Fez uma coordenação perfeita com apenas um herói
description.english: Achieved a Perfect Dispatch With Only One Hero
description.french: Effectuer un dispatching parfait avec un seul héros.
description.german: Mit nur einem Helden perfekt disponiert
description.italian: Hai ottenuto un'assegnazione perfetta con un solo eroe
description.japanese: ヒーロー1人だけで「完璧な派遣」を達成した
description.koreana: 오직 한 명의 히어로로 완벽한 배치를 달성했습니다
description.russian: Один герой идеально справляется с делом.
description.schinese: 派出单个英雄达成完美派遣
description.spanish: Has completado un envío perfecto con solo un héroe.
description.tchinese: 僅用一名英雄就達成完美派遣

description.brazilian: Cobriu o gráfico todo num único chamado
description.english: Covered the Entire Graph on a Single Call
description.french: Recouvrir tout le graphique sur une seule mission.
description.german: Das gesamte Diagramm mit einem einzigen Aufruf abgedeckt
description.italian: Hai coperto l'intero grafico in una chiamata
description.japanese: 一度の通報でグラフ全体を最大まで埋めた
description.koreana: 한 번의 임무로 모든 그래프를 커버했습니다
description.schinese: 一次呼叫覆盖了整个图表
description.spanish: Has cubierto el diagrama completo en una sola llamada.
description.tchinese: 在單一呼叫事件中把整個圖表填滿

description.brazilian: Conquistou todos os bônus e evitou todas as falhas
description.english: Reached all bonuses and successfully avoid all failures
description.french: Atteindre tous les bonus et éviter tous les échecs.
description.german: Alle Boni erreicht und alle Fehlschläge erfolgreich vermieden
description.italian: Hai raggiunto tutti i bonus ed evitato tutti gli insuccessi automatici
description.japanese: 全てのボーナスを獲得し全ての失敗を回避した
description.koreana: 모든 보너스를 얻고 모든 실패를 성공적으로 피했습니다
description.russian: Все бонусы получены, а провалы предотвращены.
description.schinese: 获得全部加成且完美避开所有失败
description.spanish: Has alcanzado todas las bonificaciones y evitado todos los fracasos.
description.tchinese: 達成所有加成，並成功避開所有失敗狀況

displayName.japanese: フェニックス・ダウン

description.brazilian: Curou o mesmo herói duas vezes em um turno
description.english: Healed the Same Hero Twice in a Shift
description.french: Soigner le même héros deux fois en une période.
description.german: Denselben Helden zweimal in einer Schicht geheilt
description.italian: Hai curato due volte lo stesso eroe in un turno
description.japanese: 一度のシフトで同じヒーローを二度回復させた
description.koreana: 한 번의 근무 동안 동일한 히어로를 두 번 치료했습니다
description.russian: Один герой получает лечение дважды за смену.
description.schinese: 同一班次内治疗同一个英雄两次
description.spanish: Has curado al mismo héroe dos veces en un turno.
description.tchinese: 在同一次勤務中，對同一名英雄進行兩次治療

description.brazilian: Terminou de hackear um nível faltando menos de 5 segundos
description.english: Completed a Hacking Level With less than 5 Seconds Left
description.french: Terminer un niveau de piratage avec moins de 5 secondes restantes.
description.german: Ein Hacking-Level mit weniger als 5 Sekunden Restzeit abgeschlossen
description.italian: Completa un hackeraggio con meno di 5 secondi rimasti
description.japanese: 残り時間5秒未満でハッキングレベルをクリアした
description.koreana: 5초 미만 남은 상태로 해킹 레벨 하나를 완료했습니다
description.russian: Взлом завершён за 5 секунд до конца таймера.
description.schinese: 在剩下不到5秒的时间里完成黑客关卡
description.spanish: Has completado un nivel de hackeo con menos de 5 segundos de tiempo restante.
description.tchinese: 在倒數5秒內完成駭客關卡

description.english: Completed a Hacking Level With at least a third of the Timer Left
description.french: Terminer un niveau de piratage avec au moins un tiers du minuteur restant.
description.german: Ein Hacking-Level mit mindestens einem Drittel der Restzeit abgeschlossen

description.japanese: 制限時間を1/3以上残してハッキングレベルをクリアした

description.russian: Взлом завершён, когда осталась ещё треть таймера.

description.spanish: Has completado un nivel de hackeo con al menos un tercio del tiempo restante.
description.tchinese: 在計時器剩下三分之一以上的情況下，完成駭客關卡

description.french: Augmenter une stat jusqu'à 10.
description.italian: Migliora una statistica a 10
description.japanese: 1つのステータスを10まで強化した
description.spanish: Has mejorado un atributo hasta 10.

description.french: Améliorer totalement un héros.
description.german: Einen Helden auf die Höchststufe gebracht
description.italian: Migliora un eroe al massimo
description.japanese: ヒーロー1人を最大まで強化した
description.spanish: Has mejorado a un héroe al máximo.

description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti i trofei
